item.title: Bye Bye Wordpress
item.description: So long Wordpress, and thanks for all the fish.

item.title: Breathing new life to my 9 year old blog
item.description: The holidays are officially now over, and aside from me working on a new app I also worked on my blog.

item.title: I Know I Needed To Change Something
item.description: My all time favorite quote was said by Steve Jobs back in 2005 during his Stanford speech:

item.title: Four Years Ago, I Quit My Job
item.description: Last September marked four years since I quit my ‘full-time’ job and started my current journey.

item.title: So I quit my job, what's next?
item.description: Last week I quit my job as CTO at koombea, I had worked there for three years and made some very good friends and built some very awesome products.
